Participating in the Event:
While hunting monsters in Lineage II, you'll find a certain number of them carry items that are engraved with a letter. Collect these letters and bring them to me. You'll receive a prize based upon the word formed by the letters!
You'll find the following fourteen letters: A, C, E, F, G, H, I, L, N, O, R, S, T and II.
You can use these letters to create one of the following words: LINEAGEII, NCSOFT or CHRONICLE. Different prizes are awarded for each word formed. In some cases, different prizes will be awarded for the same word.
Event Prize Information:
Form the word LINEAGEII and you'll receive one of the following prize items: - 1 Queen Ant's Ring - 1 Core's Ring - 1 Scroll of Enchant Weapon (Grade A) - 2 Scrolls of Enchant Weapon (Grade B) - 3 L2Day - Blessed Scrolls of Resurrection - 3 L2Day - Blessed Scrolls of Escape - 3 Scrolls of Buff, out of a set of 10.
Collect the letters that form NCSOFT to get one of the following prizes: - 1 Queen Ant's Ring - 1 Core's Ring - 2 Scrolls of Enchant Weapon (Grade B) - 3 Scrolls of Enchant Weapon (Grade C) - 2 L2Day - Blessed Scroll of Resurrection - 2 L2Day - Blessed Scrolls of Escape - 2 Scrolls of Buff, out of a set of 10 (except Wind Walk).
If you collect the letters that form the word CHRONICLE, you'll receive one of the following prizes: - 1 Queen Ant's Ring - 1 Core's Ring - 3 Scrolls of Enchant Weapon (Grade C) - 4 Scrolls of Enchant Weapon (Grade D) - 1 L2Day - Blessed Scroll of Resurrection - 1 L2Day - Blessed Scroll of Escape - 1 Scroll of Buff, out of a set of 10 (except Wind Walk and Haste).
